pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil 2 Step Hair Mask 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Common Uses

Step 1 – A hydrating deep conditioner that restores shine and deep conditions.

Step 2 – Seals the cuticle for long lasting results and prevents dryness in the days following your wash.

Ingredients

STEP 1 CONDITIONER: Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Methylheptyl Isostearate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Glyceryl Oleate Citrate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil. Behenyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Hydroxyethyl Cetearamidopropyldimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate. STEP 2 SEALANT: Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Methylheptyl Isostearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Propylene Glycol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil. Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate.

Directions

Directions: After shampooing, apply Step 1 to damp hair and spread throughout, focusing on hair lengths and strands. Do not rinse.

Without rinsing, apply Step 2 directly on top of Step 1 and let sit for 5 minutes. To finish, rinse thoroughly with water and dry hair as per your usual routine.
